title: Day 5 - Learned about animations, chess, Bootstrap and insurance
content:
• Today I made an animation with the concept of domino and instead of using large cuboids I used towers of small cubes and a large ball. The camera movement gives a cinematic feel to the animation. I have other ideas also about the animation and I will execute them tomorrow.
  • Today I played only rapid games (10+0) and was able to play well from both black and white. The first five moves in every game were all book moves according to the engine. I am quite happy about the games I played today.
  • Today I completed my Bootstrap tutorial with CodeWithHarry and made a complete Blog Website using most of the components of bootstrap. It was a great experience learning from this channel. Now my next step is to learn Angular from the same channel.
  • I watched the second episode of Understanding Insurance and today I learned about life insurance. Now I know why life insurance is important, when is the best time to take it, and how to compare different insurance packages. The most important takeaway was to always take a terms plan because with a small amount one can get a very large cover.
author: Aarush Popli
